data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 1, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daryl Dike for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Nima Saghafi signals a Orlando throw-in in Atlanta's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Atlanta.
In the minute 3, Atlanta to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Nima Saghafi awards Orlando a goal kick.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in Orlando.
In the minute 12, Nima Saghafi signals a Atlanta throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Atlanta.
Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 13, Goal! A Junior Urso header gives Orlando a 0-1 lead in Atlanta.
Chris Mueller instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 17, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Junior Urso (Orlando) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 19, Free kick Orlando.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 21, Nima Saghafi awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Atlanta's Manuel Castro misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Atlanta.
In the minute 22, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Atlanta needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 33, Brooks Lennon is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal! Chris Mueller extends Orlando's lead to 0-2.
Benji Michel with an assist there.
In the minute 36, Atlanta's Brooks Lennon looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to Orlando's area.
In the minute 38, In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 40, Atlanta's Gonzalo Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Atlanta's Gonzalo Martinez is whistled for offside at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Orlando.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Orlando.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Throw-in for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Atlanta are in shooting range from this free kick.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Orlando have a goal kick.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kyle Smith (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Atlanta make their first substitution with Jeff Larentowicz replacing Mo Adams.
Jake Mulraney is on a sub for Manuel Castro for Atlanta.
In the minute 47, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In Atlanta Atlanta drive forward through Gonzalo Martinez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Orlando at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 53, In Atlanta Atlanta attack through Gonzalo Martinez. The finish is off target, however.
Nima Saghafi awards Orlando a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.

Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, The home team have replaced Adam Jahn with Erick Torres. This is the third substitution made today by Stephen Glass.
Ezequiel Barco is replacing Matheus Rossetto for the home team.
Atlanta awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Oscar Pareja is making the team's first substitution at Mercedes-Benz Stadium with Nani replacing Daryl Dike.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a second substitution, with Jhegson Mendez replacing Oriol Rosell.
Orlando will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Atlanta.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Orlando.
Atlanta drives forward and Ezequiel Barco gets in a shot. Without netting, however.

Orlando needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.

Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Ruan is replacing Chris Mueller for Orlando at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlanta's half?
Can Atlanta capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
In the minute 76, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joao Moutinho for Orlando who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) has taken off Joao Moutinho who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Kamal Miller is the replacement.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In Atlanta a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Eric Remedi with Jurgen Damm.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 81, Orlando are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Brooks Lennon (Atlanta) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 83, Great play from Jurgen Damm to set up the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta.
In the minute 84, Andres Perea is booked for the away team.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Orlando take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Nani.
That's a fine assist from Junior Urso.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 88, Atlanta push upfield but Nima Saghafi quickly pulls them for offside.
Junior Urso for Orlando has been booked by Nima Saghafi and receives a first yellow card.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Mercedes-Benz Stadium.
In the minute 89, Antonio Carlos (Orlando) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Nima Saghafi signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to Orlando's area.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Atlanta in Atlanta.
Great shot from Atlanta's Gonzalo Martinez but he is denied by the crossbar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Atlanta.
Orlando needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
Can Atlanta capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Atlanta's Gonzalo Martinez breaks free at Mercedes-Benz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
At Mercedes-Benz Stadium, Ruan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
